Trade/Device Name(s): Contour Next Link Wireless Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Contour Next Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Contour Next Link Wireless Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Contour Next Link Wireless and Contour Next Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for home use in diabetes management
Indications for Use Summary: OTC blood glucose monitoring systems for single-patient self-testing using fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip or palm; aids diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
